alert.note: Alert for GUC110 (Guam) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 18 at 11:51PM ChST by NWS Guam
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 AM CHST MONDAY... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Saipan. * WHEN...Until 145 AM ChST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1151 PM ChST, gauge reports indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 0.5 and 1 inch of rain has fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Garapan, Dandan, China Town, Tanapag, As Mahetog, Koblerville, Chalan Kanoa I, San Antonio, Chalan Kanoa II, Chalan Kanoa III, San Roque, Kagman, Chalan Kanoa IV, Kagman III, Gualo Rai, Afetnas, Chalan Piao, Fananganan, Chalan Laulau and Chalan Kiya. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
